title: Enhancing Healthcare Practical Skills: Innovations in Generative AI and Secondary Science Education: Theory and Application

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: A theoretical framework explaining the core principles of generative AI and its educational applicability can be described.
Creative problem-solving activities using generative AI in science classes can be designed.
The advantages, disadvantages, and ethical issues of generative AI-based educational assessments can be analyzed and discussed.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
